text: you
from the outside you can tell what is
inside a black hole you can throw
television sets diamond rings for your
worst enemies into a black hole and all
the black hole will remember is a total
mass and the angular momentum an
electric charge quantum mechanics
implies that the whole of space is
filled with pairs of virtual particles
and antiparticles that are constantly
materializing in pairs and then coming
together again and annihilating each
other
one member of a pair of virtual
particles may fall into the hole leaving
the other member without a partner with
which to annihilate the Forsaken
particle or antiparticle may fall into
the black hole after its partner but it
may also escape to infinity
where it appears doubly radiation
emitted by the black hole the message of
this lecture is that black holes ain't
as black as they are painted they are
not the eternal prisons they were once
thought things can get out of a black
hole both are the outside and possibly
to another universe so if you feel you
are in a black hole don't give up
there's a way out
